results.text_hl: Due to the high comorbidity of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, co-administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with anti-@<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive drugs@@@ is likely.

results.title: Prevention of Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy:Is There a Place for Metformin?
results.text_hl: The aim of this study is to present the possibility of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive disorders of@@@ pregnancy with respect to its impact on the pathogenic elements of development

results.title: Predictors of rapid progression of estimated glomerular filtration rate among persons living with diabetes and/or hypertension in Ghana: Findings from a multicentre study
results.text_hl: The trajectory of eGFR is affected by both modifiable and non-modifiable risk factors including age, coverage of health insurance, history of smoking, and the use of angiotensin receptor blockade (ARB) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in individuals with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ and/or @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Glimepiride and Metformin Combinations in Diabetes Comorbidities and Complications: Real-World Evidence
results.text_hl: Studies report the CV protection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, as it reduces the risk factors of @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CV diseases@@@, including @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@, @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@; thus, lowering the incidence of @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@.

results.title: Extended-release metformin improves cognitive impairment in frail older women with hypertension and diabetes: preliminary results from the LEOPARDESS Study
results.text_hl: We included a control group of frail older males with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ treated with extended-release @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and a control group of frail older @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ treated with regular @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Role of Metformin in Preeclampsia: A Systematic Review.
results.text_hl: When compared to other drugs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is more likely to avoid pregnancy-related @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension disorders@@@.
